episode29.name: 29   Basketball Review, Murf Baldwin, and TJ Smith interview
episode29.description: We talk the week that was in Arkansas basketball, including the controversy in the swamp. We also have the pleasure of talking with Murf Baldwin from Saturday Down South about new OC Dan Enos and his philosophy. Then we have an exclusive recruiting interview from Colby with Arkansas recruit TJ Smith
episode29.summary: We talk the week that was in Arkansas basketball, including the controversy in the swamp.
